current-chamber.#text:
IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED
		  STATES

official-title.#text:
To authorize the Secretary of the Interior
		  to facilitate the development of hydroelectric power on the Diamond Fork System
		  of the Central Utah Project.

short-title.#text:
Bonneville Unit Clean Hydropower
			 Facilitation Act

text.#text: This Act may be cited as the

quote.#tail:
means the facilities described in chapter 4
			 of the October 2004 Supplement to the 1988 Definite Plan Report for the
			 Bonneville Unit.

text.#text: For the purposes of this Act, the term

Notwithstanding any other provision of law,
			 in order to facilitate hydropower development on the Diamond Fork System, the
			 amount of reimbursable costs allocated to project power in Chapter 6 of the
			 Power Appendix in the October 2004 Supplement to the 1988 Bonneville Unit
			 Definite Plan Report, with regard to power development upstream of the Diamond
			 Fork System, shall be considered final costs as well as costs in excess of the
			 total maximum repayment obligation as defined in

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail:
), and shall be subject
			 to the same terms and conditions.

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#text:
section 211 of the Central
			 Utah Project Completion Act of 1992
{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.@value: Central Utah Project Completion Act of 1992/s:211

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail:
to purchase or
			 market any of the power produced by the Diamond Fork power plant and none of
			 the costs associated with development of transmission facilities to transmit
			 power from the Diamond Fork power plant shall be assigned to power for the
			 purpose of Colorado River Storage Project ratemaking.

text.#text:
Nothing in
			 this Act shall obligate the

header.#text:
No purchase or market obligation; no costs
			 assigned to power

text.#text:
No facility for the
			 generation or transmission of hydroelectric power on the Diamond Fork System
			 may be financed or refinanced, in whole or in part, with proceeds of any
			 obligation—

external-xref.#tail: of the Internal Revenue Code of 1986

text.#text:
the interest on which is exempt from the
			 tax imposed under

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#text:
subpart I or J of part IV of subchapter A of chapter 1 of such
			 Code

text.#text:
with respect to which credit is allowable
			 under

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail: shall submit a report to the

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#text:
Committee
			 on Natural Resources of the House of Representatives

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail:
stating this fact, the reasons such
			 production has not yet commenced, and a detailed timeline for future hydropower
			 production.
{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#text:
Committee on
			 Energy and Natural Resources of the Senate

text.#text:
If, 24 months after the date of the
			 enactment of this Act, hydropower production on the Diamond Fork System has not
			 commenced, the

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail:

, provided
